html: I can’t stomach any more Trump Derangement Syndrome, Brexit hysteria, Omarosa bullsh*t or ‘Madonna inspired me to be f***ing annoying’ birthday tributes. Frankly, I’m bored witless by all YOUR opinions...and by MY opinions. So I’ve gone to this beach for a Twitter detox. Bye.pic.twitter.com/owL2Vlye0P
text:
I can’t stomach any more Trump Derangement Syndrome, Brexit hysteria, Omarosa bullsh*t or ‘Madonna inspired me to be f***ing annoying’ birthday tributes.

So I’ve gone to this beach for a Twitter detox. Bye.pic.twitter.com/owL2Vlye0P

html: Nasty incident in London. But these pathetic, cowardly, wannabe 'terrorists' need to understand one thing about my city very clearly: London was bombed for 57 consecutive nights in the Blitz. 32,000 Londoners died, 1.5 million London homes were destroyed. That didn't stop us.
text:
Nasty incident in London. 
But these pathetic, cowardly, wannabe 'terrorists' need to understand one thing about my city very clearly:
London was bombed for 57 consecutive nights in the Blitz.
32,000 Londoners died, 1.5 million London homes were destroyed. 
That didn't stop us.

html: To the surprise of absolutely no one, #PGAChamp ratings were up 69 percent. 6.1 peaking at 8.3 which is usually a Masters-only band for golf tv. Highest PGA rating since 09 when Tiger lost to Yang. Repeat after me: #Tiger doesn't move the needle, Tiger IS the needle
text:
To the surprise of absolutely no one, #PGAChamp ratings were up 69 percent. 6.1 peaking at 8.3 which is usually a Masters-only band for golf tv. Highest PGA rating since 09 when Tiger lost to Yang.

Repeat after me: #Tiger doesn't move the needle, Tiger IS the needle
